django.contrib.gis.gdal.error
=============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.gdal.error

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module houses the GDAL & SRS Exception objects, and the
   check_err() routine which checks the status code returned by
   GDAL/OGR methods.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.error.OGRERR_DICT
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.error.CPLERR_DICT
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.error.ERR_NONE


Exceptions
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.error.GDALException
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.error.SRSException


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.error.check_err


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: GDALException

   Bases: :py:obj:`Exception`


   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.


.. py:exception:: SRSException

   Bases: :py:obj:`Exception`


   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.


.. py:data:: OGRERR_DICT

.. py:data:: CPLERR_DICT

.. py:data:: ERR_NONE
   :value: 0


.. py:function:: check_err(code, cpl=False)

   Check the given CPL/OGRERR and raise an exception where appropriate.
